translation.title: Let's open the flights between Varna and Italy
translation.description: In collaboration with the Consular Representative of Varna we are collecting signatures to promote the reopening of flights between Varna and Italy. Once we have reached a sufficient number of names, we will contact the airlines, embassies and consulates in Italy and Bulgaria to restore the flights.
translation.signatures: Number of people that have signed already
translation.didNotPartecipate: Didn't you sign yet the petition?
translation.compile: Click here and fulfill the form
translation.messageCounter: The update of the number of signatures is automatic but may have delays of updating up to 10 minutes
